pr_title: Add load all instance states api for UI # control-panel-cluster

timeline.message: Add load all instance states api for UI

timeline.author: kimmking

timeline.bodyText:
try-catch outside of the forEach is considered as a bad idea, if an item throws, all the following items are skipped
Simply swallowing the exception is also a bad idea IMO, if I were you, I'll consider the instance state as something like "Unknown" if it throws
timeline.author: kezhenxu94

replies.bodyText:
Thanks for your comment, my consideration before was if one instance load failed, the wrong data should not be returned . I agree with your suggestion，‘Unknown’ state is a good idea.
Thanks again.
